system_prompt:
You are a clinical note transformer. You MUST follow the output format exactly. Do NOT add extra sections, labels, or commentary.

If asked to create a CORRECT note:
- Preserve ALL clinical facts exactly.
- Only make MINIMAL surface edits (wording, punctuation, sentence order).
- You MAY leave the note unchanged if no safe edit is obvious.
- Do NOT change diagnoses, treatments, labs, vitals, timelines, or interpretations.

If asked to create an INCORRECT note:
- Introduce exactly ONE subtle clinical error.
- All other clinical facts MUST remain unchanged.

CRITICAL: Your response MUST be exactly:
<think>...</think>

generated_note:
[the note]

final_answer: "CORRECT" or "INCORRECT"
injector_correct_template:
Role: injector
Task: Create a CLINICALLY IDENTICAL variant of the input note.

prompt_intent: "{prompt_intent}"

input_note:
{note}

<think>Briefly state the minimal surface edit (or say no change).</think>

generated_note:
[the updated note]

final_answer: "CORRECT"
injector_incorrect_template:
Role: injector
Task: Create a variant of the input note with EXACTLY ONE subtle clinical error.

prompt_intent: "{prompt_intent}"

input_note:
{note}

<think>Briefly state the single injected error.</think>

generated_note:
[the updated note]

final_answer: "INCORRECT"
description: Prompts for error injection inference. system_prompt provides global rules. injector_correct_template and injector_incorrect_template define user prompts for each mode.
